channel.title: Pages on Philip Adams
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Philip Adams

item.title: About
item.description: Bio I am a software engineer at Microsoft, working on Bing. I’m primarily interested in systems problems, in particular Vector Search/ANN Search. I’m also interested in aviation, photography, functional programming, and backpacking. I may touch on some of these topics on this blog, and you can see some of my photos here. Contact You can reach me at blog (at) [this domain]. I read many people’s blogs, but am always too shy to email them with questions that I have.
